Articles.Content: Hello there, I can't say that I am new with KSP, but I am certainly new to the forums . My name is Crazybanana btw.

Hi Crazybanana, welcome to the community

I hope you have fun here on the forums, check out the Challenges board and the Add-ons section, there is a lot there to try

Welcome to the forums, Crazybanana.

There's lots to do if you are a pro at KSP like visiting the Challenge section and Add-On section that sal_vagar mentioned.

There's also some quite good threads about KSP in General Discussion, some good fanwork in the fanwork section consisting of writing, pictures, art and movies and we discuss interesting things in Off-Topic as well, the fun never stops.

Hope you enjoy your stay here and go blow up some rockets .
